recommendations.action: Implement server-side validation for all payment calculations
recommendations.rationale: Client-side payment calculations can be manipulated to reduce payment amounts

recommendations.rationale: Unvalidated input can lead to XSS, injection attacks, and data corruption

recommendations.rationale: Property-based testing catches edge cases that traditional unit tests miss
